pros:
Purpose driven, independent think-tank
Values focused with strong leadership team
Flexible work options 
Committed group of colleagues
cons: Some processes are old and cumbersome

review_title: Filled with bullies and dumb lazy manipulators
pros: Absolutely none really. You cannot thing of a single positive thing h about the company, your career and skills start to go downhill
cons:
- preferential treatment to close aides
- harassing nature of team leads and directors
- if they see you as threat, they come up with pre planned and discussed confidential feedback to keep a lid
- highly inept members who have absolutely no skills organisation wide
- legal cases pending by staff members against the company
